column2: "Hey, wait up! Since we're going ahead, should we go up to the corrupted area?"
"Corrupted area... In this unstable place? I guess."
"This is [Profound Darkness]'s feeding grounds. [Profound Darkness]' bait grows here. But..."
"Hmmm. But, this isn't the place where [Profound Darkness] is resurrected?"
"Then... There's no use for this corrupted zone. It's left completely suspended. I wonder why..."
"This place, there's no getting used to it. Time flows differently here."
"You can feel something up ahead, right? If you're investigating, then be quick."
